title: Write tests for approve/reject commands
description:
Add integration tests for the new approve and reject commands in cmd/tk/main_test.go

Test cases for tk approve:
1. Approve tick awaiting approval → tick closes
2. Approve tick awaiting review → tick closes
3. Approve tick awaiting content → tick closes
4. Approve tick awaiting work → tick closes
5. Approve tick awaiting input → tick returns to agent (not closed)
6. Approve tick awaiting escalation → tick returns to agent
7. Approve tick awaiting checkpoint → tick returns to agent
8. Approve tick not awaiting → error
9. Approve non-existent tick → error (exit 4)
10. Approve with --json → JSON output

Test cases for tk reject:
1. Reject tick awaiting approval → tick returns to agent
2. Reject tick awaiting input → tick closes (can't proceed)
3. Reject tick awaiting escalation → tick closes (won't do)
4. Reject with feedback → note added before state change
5. Reject tick not awaiting → error
6. Reject with --json → JSON output

Follow existing test patterns (temp dir, create tick, run command, verify state).
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Tests cover all awaiting types for approve
- [ ] Tests cover all awaiting types for reject
- [ ] Tests verify state transitions match spec
- [ ] Tests verify feedback note is added (reject)
- [ ] Tests verify error cases
- [ ] All tests pass
